website_summaries.verdict: Expect durability, cushioning and comfort with the Asics Gel Exalt 3. This shoe is best for road running but not reliable when it comes to long distance runs. The 3rd version is still durable, with enhanced stability and support. The shoe is ideal for those overpronators who are looking for an affordable yet reliable road companion.
pros: This shoe is very comfortable to wear as mentioned in some reviews
It comes with a wider toe box that made some runners happy
The Asics Gel Exalt 3 features the Duomax Support System that enhanced its stability and support
It has rearfoot gel cushioning for a smooth transition
The Gel Exalt 3 is durable, said some testers
cons: Some runners felt that this shoe lacks the technology needed for high mileage running

customer_reviews.title: Great option to the high priced Gel Kayanos!
customer_reviews.text: I have one pair for walking around (aka "killing these shoes fast") and one for my shorter run days (aka these will last). I was having problems with plantar fascitis and my feet feel SO much better after using these shoes. I loved my Gel Kayanos but they have exceeded by cash budget. These Gel Exalts are glorious.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gray-Lion

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite running shoes so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a well cushioned running shoe that also offers a bit of extra support for overpronation. This shoe fits the bill. I have to run on concrete, and at my advanced age (47 and counting) this can be brutal on my feet. I also suffer from Morton's Toe, so the soft cushioning is an absolute requirement. These are my favorite running shoes so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Aggie

customer_reviews.title: A Great "Special Needs" Retailing Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Until I retired, I worked in retail all of my life. So what? I was on my feet all day long, despite having one leg partially paralyzed by polio! Many of us in retailing routinely rely on running shoes because they are the most comfortable for an "on your feet" job that requires a lot of quick movement. For me the choice of shoe was doubly important. I can't use the muscle in my bad leg as a shock absorber, so must rely on the shoe instead. The Gel-Exalt 3 turned out to be perfect. I recommend it and I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Georgette Wolf

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable, provide a reasonable amount of arch support (I ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a runner, but I use these shoes to walk fairly long distances ( 6-10 miles within a day). They are comfortable, provide a reasonable amount of arch support (I have flat feet), and they look nice besides. They wear as well as other Asics models and I have no complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: justme

customer_reviews.title: Just like my first-gen Gel-Exalts
customer_reviews.text: Replacements (eventually, using both at the same time now) for my Gel-Exalt 1s. Just like the older verrsion, plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: socker

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these during a lightning deal for my husband and he is very happy with my purchase. Traditionally he is a New Balance kind of guy and prefers the brand for his running needs, but I had heard great things about Asics and couldn't pass up the good deal. He runs about 3-5 miles every morning and we also parttake in a lot of outdoor activities. He wears these now not only for his runs, but also casually for walks or days at the park.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa LuMing

customer_reviews.title: Still like the Gel-Exalt 3s
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time purchasing the Gel-Exalt 3 shoe and I still like them a lot. One issue I have, my shoes were potentially damaged during shipping? I am not exactly sure, but there was a weird crease in on top front of the shoe where my big toe rests and it causes irritating pressure. This is not consistent with my previous pair, so I will not mark it against the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Travis S.

customer_reviews.title: asics mens exalt 3 shoe
customer_reviews.text: this shoe has been my go to shoe for my daily stair running regimen. it has great cushion, support and comfort. i have been using the asics exalt shoes and the quality has been impressive so far.
customer_reviews.author: bo

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as a Birthday gift for my husband. He has a few pairs from this brand and he likes them, but he said this pair was very very comfortable! He talked about the other Asics not been as comfortable as this shoes! Happy Buy!! Do recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: I always buy Asics for running but these shoes ruin ...
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Asics for running but these shoes ruin small. my toe hits the tip. I used them for the gym out of the box so I don.t think that he can now be returned.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Good Unisex shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes with good support foe over-pronated feet. I am on my fett 8 hours a dau and have had surgery on both my feet. When I get home my feet are tired but they don't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Porche

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but run half size large
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable and good stability. They do run a little large. Not so much that you can't run in them comfortably but I would use them more for treadmill running
customer_reviews.author: Koi

customer_reviews.title: If the shoe fits..
customer_reviews.text: Can't tell any difference between this model or the gt1000... except that this model is less than half the price! D width is even plenty wide for my E width feet!

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, but small for an 8 which I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but small for an 8 which I always wear. There are small black spots within the white sole of one shoe.....I suspect it was a "second" which could be reasoning for the price. Good lesson as I will not buy shoes again online.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for running and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Always love Asics- First, this purchase was well priced- This specific product provided a good air when running, better than my previous Asics

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I expected but good support. I’ve run 2.5 Miles a day for 6 months in them without recurrence of plantar fasciitis
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes I would put it at a 4.5 rating. They were a great bang for the buck and I’ve been satisfied so for.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Clark

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: 14 yr old son said they were great, wore them all day the first two days of school. Had worn them some off and on before school started. He has a high arch. Happy they have arch support, many other brands and styles have no support.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit every time.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. Different colors though. Always a perfect fit, great support and able to wear right out of the box.

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit, Great Color!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best athletic shoe I've ever purchased. I LOVE the fit and the metallic blue color. I get compliments on these all the time.

customer_reviews.title: Feet fall asleep - tough finding the right tightness
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is well constructed, but for whatever reason, I have had a difficult time getting the laces tightened just right. On one run, I had to stop as my feet went numb. But this is likely due to my feet, and will not be your experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe laces too long!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe laces that ship with these shoes are ridiculously long - 57" to be exact. Now I have to buy new shoe laces for brand new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: diyer3117

customer_reviews.title: ... a little snug I'm older so the cushion is good I own many pairs of asics now and always ...
customer_reviews.text: Only ran in them a few times so far a little snug I'm older so the cushion is good I own many pairs of asics now and always will these will work 1/2 size too small my fault

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable for running
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding athletic shoes! very comfortable for running! very happy with this purchase and would highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't gotten shin splints since I bought these for jogging.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: ... what I expected them to be and I am pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. Very stylish. The fit may seem a bit snug - as athletic shoes should - and if so, just switch to socks that are not quite so thick.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for distance running
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe for distance running. Comfortable fit, holds up pretty well to wear and tear. It doesn't have the problem that my old Gel-Exalt 2's did where the ankle supports curl in and start tearing up your ankles after a while.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand, and price but, slightly small. It will work.

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoe for me!
customer_reviews.text: I would not run with anything but ASICS. These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever run in. Fit great, great support.

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: love my asics . most comfortable shoe i've had. will continue to purchase them. keep up good work. give them a 5

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My go to shoe for years now. Tried most brands and these are my favorites.

customer_reviews.title: As good as the original exalts'
customer_reviews.text: These Exalt 3's make up for the bad #2s they made last year!! The 3's have good support and a nice firm, thick insert.

customer_reviews.text: A bought these as work shoes . If you don't need steel toes , these are as comfortable in a warehouse as you can buy .

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the Nike's I had before
customer_reviews.text: Way better than the Nike's I had before. I have high arches and overpronate. These shoes provide the support and comfort I needed.

customer_reviews.text: There were little black spots on the white rubber insole (instep) that would not come off. There were spots on both shoes. Would have returned but needed the shoes. Like the way they fit but poor quality control. Have been pleased with Asics in the past.

customer_reviews.text: Best sneakers I've ever worn that help a great deal in overpronation. Good price, nice looking, another pair on the way.

customer_reviews.title: Good for tendonitus
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I have tendonitis and these make my door feel better than any other show so far.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoes. I have a narrow foot but need ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. I have a narrow foot but need a wide toebox, and these worked great for me.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Asics seem to run on size as expected. The shoes fit great and they feel great on my feet. I'm always happy when I buy Asics for workout and running shoes.

customer_reviews.text: I need a running show that has "stability" rather than a neutral shoe and this is a good purchase for the price.

customer_reviews.title: I wore them running once and they were too loose ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore them running once and they were too loose. When I tighten the laces they snug around the top of the foot but it was still too much movement at the bottom.

customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe, super comfortable. I am a bigger guy 300 lbs plus and these shoe support my feet like no other shoe has in the past.

customer_reviews.title: comfort and durability and these do not disappoint.
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of ASICS for fit, comfort and durability and these do not disappoint.

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: My son has purchased and ran in several pairs of asics and his favorite has always been the Exalt. However, this pair has a big glue looking seam in different spots and it doesn't look as if the sole of the shoe is of very good quality. I'm very upset because my son's cross country conditioning starts Friday and I don't know what we are going to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it is my sixth from Asics and all have worked great.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, saves my legs and back. Typical Asics quality

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortably padded in the sole as previous Asics I've ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortably padded in the sole as previous Asics I've ordered.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck when on sale
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the asics gel exalt line. They're lightweight, have sturdy cushion in and are comfortable. I use them for work as I am on my feet on concrete at a warehouse walking and moving up to 10 miles a day, five days a week. The duo max feature reduces the shock in the forefoot and reduces achy feet. I go through a pair every 4-5 months, much better than when I wore Nike airs, which only lasted around 3 months and costed twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Mark

customer_reviews.title: asics sizing
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Asics .5 size bigger and they fit great. I also like the look of these black shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Payne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.  On time delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting so used to superior service from Amazon and its partnerships that I actually expect five-star service--from quality of product to expediency of delivery. This puts a great burden on Amazon and its suppliers to continuously provide excellence every single day. And you've done exactly that. Thanks for your unbreakable chain of exemplary service year after year after year. REG
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Graglia

customer_reviews.title: Best Everyday Shoe I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: ASICS are the best shoes I've ever owned. They last for ~4 years of constant, daily use and feel great. This is my third pair and ASICS's quality is only getting better. I use them as everyday shoes now, but I've used them for running in the past. Just an all-around great shoe. I think they're worth the slight premium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ASICS are my running shoe of choice.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. I have them on right now. Good looking. Noticed how it improved my treadmill experience right away. Less fatigue. more quailty support
customer_reviews.author: Monster

customer_reviews.title: My husband found these to be average.
customer_reviews.text: My husband found these to be average. He did not feel they had the support or fit he is used to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes it and wear it everyday. Great deal and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - coming apart
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Stitching has unraveled and is progressively getting worse. Support material has separated from the mesh. This is after a mere 6 weeks - with use on weekends only. Beyond the return policy so I have no means of holding ASICS and Amazon accountable for the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Angi Brown

product_meta.title: ASICS Mens Gel-Exalt 3-M Gel-Exalt 3
product_meta.description: Approved by the american podiatric medical association, the GEL-Exalt 3 running shoe is designed for optimal foot health and the perfect blend of comfort and technology. Our DuoMax support system and Rearfoot gel cushioning system enhance support and soften the shock from harsh impact - providing all-day stability and comfort.
feature_bullets: Lace-up running shoe featuring breathable mesh upper with supportive synthetic overlays
